title: Julah Village Experience (Half-day)
overview: Visit Julah Village, a traditional Bali Aga community known for its ancient customs and unique culture.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the village, meet locals and learn about their traditions.

title: Julah Village & North Bali Tour (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Julah Village and North Bali's attractions.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the village, meet locals and learn about their traditions.
